tool.name: matchMS

param.label: Reference spectra
param.name: references
param.help: Reference mass spectra to match against as library.

param.label: Queries spectra
param.name: queries
param.help: Query mass spectra to match against references.

param.label: Similarity metric
param.name: similarity_metric
param.help: Similarity metric to use for score computation.

param.label: tolerance
param.name: tolerance
param.help: Peaks will be considered a match when less than tolerance apart. Absolute m/z value, not in ppm.

param.label: mz_power
param.name: mz_power
param.help: The power to raise mz to in the cosine function.

param.label: intensity_power
param.name: intensity_power
param.help: The power to raise intensity to in the cosine function.

tool.help:
Documentation For documentation on the tool see https://github.com/matchms/matchms/blob/master/README.rst or for more details https://matchms.readthedocs.io/en/latest/.
Upstream Tools +-----------+---------------+--------+-----------+ | Name | Output File | Format | Parameter | +===========+===============+========+===========+ | RAMClustR | Mass spectra | msp | references| +-----------+---------------+--------+-----------+ | RAMClustR | Mass spectra | msp | queries | +-----------+---------------+--------+-----------+
Downstream Tools The **output** is a csv which contains the similarity score and second csv containing the number of matched peaks.
